divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were watching TV, the wife was laying on the couch directly infront of the television, and I on the other couch to the left. The TV is inbetween a window and a 3 season room that is all windows. Out of nowhere my wife jumps up and runs toward the window and then to the door. I asked what was going on, was it a visitor, was it some one breaking into our neighbors house, what are you looking at. She starts asking me, "Did you see it, Did you see it?!?!?" I told her I did not, and what was I suppose to see? She described an object that was rectangle in shape and had two lights on the outside. I said it must have been a plane or something, but she disagreed saying no it was right above our neighbors tree. The tree is probably 35-40 feet tall. We stayed outside for a while longer and saw nothing else. We came back inside continued watching more TV and she jumps up again. This time I was close behind her and we went outside. And sure enough there it was doing a U turn hovered above our neighbors house for maybe 5 seconds and then took off. I don't know what it was I don't believe it was a plane because of how low it was.
Summary: 2 quick viewings of rectangular object above neighbors house.
